title: Re: 2005
content:
1.) I was completely sarcastic when I made this topic.

2.) Blegd and Smeeg are TOTALLY 2005. I made them up about... *Checks date* The oldest picture I have of them has the date on the file as Wednesday, April 13, 2005. Now they weren't as developed back then mind you.

I drew the first B&S comic like... late November if I remember correctly.

3.) You are right... '05 was crap. Only good thing was Rocket Jess' group shot pic.

And Z-1s demos...

And a bunch of other stuff I forgot. Dang... 2005 was a long year...-----------------------
[url=http://Galaxie.Spatang.com][img]http://img360.imageshack.us/img360/548/blegdandsmeegnewbanner2wf.png[/img][/url]

title: Re: 2005
content:
Yeah... Keenwise... ... ... 'cause I joined?

Though Bledg and Smeeg were '05 creations.

I also think we may appreciate it more if we have rewards.

It will encourage ppl to think "Oh, that peice of crap won? I can do better in my sleep"... and soon production might increase.

Or else; I predict a downhill spiral.

BTW: How hard is putting this togather? just copy last years criteria, and let the nominations begin.

Then, just take the most popular, and give them mass produced trophies: A simple "Keen Awards, 2005" will do, and just mass produce it.

-- Naj
